title: Abyssal Blade
Achimenes Furl
Adroit War Tome
content:
{{Weapon Infobox
|tagid=SID_戦神の戦術書
|intID=3029
|userVersion1=Closed
|userVersion2=Open
|exclusive=1
|weaponType=Colorless Tome
|cost=400
|might=14
|range=2
|cooldown=-1
|effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Res+6 to unit during combat and the following effects will occur based on the value of unit's Res minus foe's Res: If ≥ 1, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. If ≥ 5, if foe uses sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast damage, foe cannot counterattack. If ≥ 10, reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% (example: a foe with a "reduce damage by 45%" skill would reduce damage by 23% instead).
|statModifiers=0,14,0,0,0
|required=Atlas (weapon)
|properties=
}}
==Notes==
{{UnitStatMinusFoeStat|stat=Res}}
{{Guaranteed follow-up interaction}}
{{Prevent counterattacks}}
{{Reduce Damage Reduction}}

At start of turn, if any foe's Res < unit's Res and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Res-6 and status preventing counterattacks on that foe through its next action. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Res+6 to unit and deals damage = total penalties on foe during combat. (If the "calculates damage from staff like other weapons" effect is neutralized, damage from staff is calculated after combat damage is added.)
|statModifiers=0,14,0,0,3
|required=Assault
|properties=random_owner
}}
==Notes==
* Asclepius has the same effect as {{St|Wrathful Staff}}.

At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-3 on that foe and bonuses on that foe become penalties through its next action. |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,3 |userVersion1=Closed |userVersion2=Open |userVersion3=Gleam Closed |userVersion4=Gleam Open |required=Fenrir |SE=Se effect inverse.flac |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |upgradedEffect=Grants Res+3. At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on that foe and bonuses on that foe become penalties through its next action. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Spd/Res-4 on foe during combat. |tagidExtraSkill1=一 |effectSkill1=At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75% or 【Penalty】is active on foe, inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Spd/Res during combat = 4 + any current penalty on each of those stats. (Example: if foe has -7 penalty to Atk, inflicts Atk-11, for a net penalty of Atk-18 during combat.) Calculates each stat penalty independently.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard). |iconSkill1=Aversas Night W.png |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Penalties}} {{Panic}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{EffectfromPenalty}} {{CombatReductionfromPenalty}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=インバースの暗闇 |german=Aversas Nacht |spanishEU=Noche Aversa |spanishLA=Noche Aversa |french=Nuit d'Aversa |italian=Notte di Aversa |chineseTW=茵巴絲的黑暗 |portuguese=Noite de Aversa }} ==References== ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%any foe\'s HP%unit\'s HP%and that foe is adjacent to another foe%' OR Description LIKE '%inflicts penalty on foe\'s%=%any current penalty on each of those stats%' AND exclusive='1' AND WikiName NOT LIKE '%vulture%'|columns=3}} * [[Skill families#Vulture|Vulture Weapons]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

content:
{{Weapon Infobox
|tagid=SID_宝剣ソフィア
|weaponType=Sword
|might=16
|range=1
|effect=Grants Def+3. At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 4 damage to unit.
|cost=400
|exclusive=1
|statModifiers=0,16,0,3,0
|required=Silver Sword
|userVersion1=Weapon
|userVersion2=Upgrade Gleam
|refinePaths=default
|refineSP=400
|refineMedals=500
|refineDews=200
|upgradedEffect=Grants Def+3. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat. After combat, if unit attacked, deals 4 damage to unit.
|effectSkill1=At start of combat, if unit's or foe's HP < 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat, and if unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)"
|iconSkill1=Beloved Zofia W.png
|tagidExtraSkill1=回
|properties=random_owner
}}
==Notes==
* The 100% HP requirement applies to both the Atk/Spd/Def/Res +4 as well as the 4 damage after combat.

{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_ルネスの礼剣 |weaponName=Blade of Renais |image=wep_sw112 |weaponType=Sword |might=16 |range=1 |cooldown=-1 |effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit, and also, if【Bonus】or【Penalty】is active on unit, deals damage = 20% of foe's Def, and also, if unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores HP to unit = 20% of foe's Def. 【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." title: Celestial Globe
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_魔継ぐ少女の天球儀 |intID=3423 |image=wep_mg075 |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Red Tome |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |cooldown=-1 |effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants "unit cannot be slowed by terrain (does not apply to impassable terrain)" and 【Null Follow-Up】to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn. If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit during combat, deals damage = 20% of unit's Spd (including when dealing damage with a Special triggered before combat), and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50%. (Example: a foe with a "reduce damage by 45%" skill would reduce damage by 23% instead.)

【Null Follow-Up】
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd during combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks for 1 turn. |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,0 |required=Bolganone;Fenrir |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Ignore Terrain}} {{Null Follow-Up}} {{Temporary buffs}} {{DamageBoost}} {{Reduce Damage Reduction}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== V7.1_v0701a_khadein_Mag_2.webp|Sprite sheet for {{PAGENAME}}'s animation. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=魔継ぐ少女の天球儀 |german=Himmelskugel |spanishEU=Esfera celestial |spanishLA=Esfera celestial |french=Sphère céleste |italian=Globo celeste |chineseTW=繼魔少女的天球儀 |portuguese=Globo celestial }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%cannot be slowed by terrain%' OR Description LIKE '%【Null Follow-Up】%' OR Description LIKE '%"reduce damage by X%" skills by 50%') AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Null Passives]] * [[Skill families/B Passives#Tempo|Tempo Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Chaos Manifest
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_負の力 |weaponType=Green Tome |might=14 |range=2 |effect=Grants Res+3. If a penalty inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and/or a negative status effect (preventing counterattacks or restricting movement) is active on foe, grants Atk+6 during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |canUseMove={{MoveList|all}} |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,3 |required=Rexcalibur |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |upgradedEffect=Grants Res+3. At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk+6, Res+5 to unit during combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, and also, if unit initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by X% (X = 2 × total penalties on the foe within 2 spaces of target, including target, who has the highest total penalties).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard). |tagidExtraSkill1=一 |effectSkill1=If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat and deals damage = total penalties on the foe within 2 spaces of target (including target) who has the highest total penalties (excluding area-of-effect Specials). |iconSkill1=Chaos Manifest W.png |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Temporary buffs}} {{EffectfromPenalty|target=foe|temporary buffs and follow-up effects}} {{Guaranteed follow-up interaction}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{DamagePercentageReduction}} {{IfUnitInitiates}} {{DamageBoost|name={{St|Chaos Manifest|refine=Skill1}}}} {{EffectfromPenalties|damage boost and damage reduction|name={{St|Chaos Manifest|refine=Skill1}}|multiTarget=1|target=target and foes within 2 spaces of target}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== V3.3 802 legend15 Mag.png|Sprite sheet for {{PAGENAME}}'s animation. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=負の力 |german=Gestalt des Chaos |spanishEU=Espíritu del Caos |spanishLA=Espíritu caótico |french=Pouvoir du chaos |italian=Caos scatenato |chineseTW=負之力 |portuguese=Espírito do caos }} ==References== ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%if%Penalty%is active on foe%makes a guaranteed follow-up%' OR Description LIKE '%deals damage = total%penalties%' AND Exclusive='1'}} {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Covert Cat Fang
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_柔なる戦猫の爪牙 |weaponType=Beast |might=14 |range=1 |effect=Grants Def+3. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+3 to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit during combat. At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack. |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |canUseMove=Cavalry |statModifiers=0,14,0,3,0 |required=Adult (Cavalry) |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |upgradedEffect=Grants Def+3. If unit initiates combat or is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat. Grants Atk/Def+4 to allies within 3 spaces during combat.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack. |upgradedEffect2=Grants Def+3. If unit initiates combat or is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat. Grants Atk/Def+4 to allies within 3 spaces during combat. At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 to unit, inflicts Atk/Def-X on foe during combat (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat + 3; max 6), and also, if X ≥ 5, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30% during combat. |tagidExtraSkill1=一 |effectSkill1=At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks, and deals damage = number of allies within 3 spaces × 5. (Excluding area-of-effect Specials; max 15.) |iconSkill1=Covert Cat Fang W.png |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Temporary buffs}} {{AlliesCombatEffect|effect=temporary buffs}} {{Beast (Cavalry)}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{IfUnitInitiates}} {{Follow-up effect neutralization|preventOnly=1|name={{St|Covert Cat Fang|refine=skill1}}}} {{DamageBoost|name={{St|Covert Cat Fang|refine=skill1}}}} {{Beast (Cavalry) Upgrade}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=柔なる戦猫の爪牙 |german=Listige Pranke |spanishEU=Garra afable |spanishLA=Colmillo afable |french=Croc calme |italian=Zanna di gatto |chineseTW=溫和戰貓的爪牙 |portuguese=Presa discreta }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%grants%/%+%to allies within _ spaces%if unit is within _ spaces of an ally%grants%/%+%during combat%' OR Description LIKE '%if unit is within _ spaces of an ally%grants%/%+%to unit and allies%during combat%') AND WikiName NOT LIKE '%allied%' OR Description LIKE '%deals damage = number of allies within _ spaces%'}} * [[Skill families#Allied|Allied Weapons]] * [[Joint Drive Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

Cunning Bow
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_謀略の戦弓 |weaponType=Bow |might=14 |range=2 |effectiveness=flying |effect=Grants Spd+3. Effective against flying foes. When total bonuses on unit + total penalties on foe ≥ 10, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe during combat. (Example: if unit has a +5 bonus and foe has a -5 penalty, the calculated total will be 10.) |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |userVersion1=Bow |userVersion2=Arrow |statModifiers=0,14,3,0,0 |required=Silver Bow |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |upgradedEffect=Effective against flying foes. Grants Spd+3. If【Bonus】is active on unit or if【Penalty】 is active on foe, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe during combat. If unit initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by percentage = total bonuses on unit and penalties on foe × 3 (max 60%), and also, if total bonuses on unit and penalties on foe ≥ 10, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. (Example: if unit has a +5 bonus and foe has a -5 penalty, the calculated total will be 10.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard). |tagidExtraSkill1=一 |effectSkill1=At start of turn, if any foes are within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit, inflicts Def-7 on those foes through their next actions, and grants Atk+6 to unit for 1 turn. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat, grants additional bonus to unit's Atk during combat = current bonus on unit's Atk, and inflicts penalty on foe's Def during combat = current penalty on foe's Def. |iconSkill1=Cunning Bow W.png |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Effective damage bonus|flying}} {{Temporary debuffs}} * Cunning Bow's "total bonus + total penalty" count only counts {{SEt|Bonuses}} and {{SEt|Penalties}}, not [[Temporary buffs]] or [[Temporary debuffs]]. ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{EffectfromBonus|name=refined Cunning Bow}} {{EffectfromPenalty|name=refined Cunning Bow}} {{IfUnitInitiates}} {{DamagePercentageReduction|name=refined Cunning Bow}} {{Follow-up effect neutralization|preventOnly=1|name=refined Cunning Bow}} {{Penalties|name={{St|Cunning Bow|refine=Skill1}}}} {{Bonuses|name={{St|Cunning Bow|refine=Skill1}}}} {|class="wikitable default mw-collapsible" !align="middle"|Example of Area of Effect |- |align="middle"!|

at start of combat }} ==Notes== * Divine Mist has the same effect as {{St|Distant Counter}}. {{Effective damage bonus|dragon}} {{LowerDefRes}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{Temporary buffs|name={{St|Divine Mist|refine=skill1}}}} {{TemporaryDebufffromBonus|name={{St|Divine Mist|refine=skill1}}}} *** The decrease to the foe's Atk stat is equal to 75% of the ''sum'' of the Def/Res bonuses active on the unit. ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== v2.9_602_legend09_Mag.png|Sprite sheet for Divine Mist's animation. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=神霧のブレス |german=Heiliger Nebel |spanishEU=Bruma divina |spanishLA=Bruma divina |french=Brume divine |italian=Nebbia divina |chineseTW=神霧吐息 |portuguese=Névoa divina }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=((WeaponEffectiveness='dragon' AND CanUseWeapon__full LIKE 'Red Breath%Breath') OR Description LIKE '%inflicts penalty on foe_s %=%total bonuses on unit%') AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Weapons with Distant Counter]] * [[Weapons with Close Counter]] * [[Sources of effective against dragon foes]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Flame Lance
Flame of Múspell
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_絶炎ムスペル |intID=2837 |userVersion1=Bow |userVersion2=Arrow |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Bow |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |cooldown=-1 |effectiveness=Flying |effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). Effective against flying foes. If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Spd+6 and Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = 50% of total bonuses on unit and foe (max: +12), and also, if total bonuses on unit and foe ≥ 10, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance). |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,0 |required=Silver Bow |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Effective damage bonus|flying}} {{EffectfromBonusKeyword}} {{CombatBoostfromBonus|multiSource=1|bnsSource=the unit and foe|source=the unit and foe|percent=half}} {{Follow-up effect neutralization|preventOnly=1}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== wep_ar078.webp|Spritesheet of '''Flame of Múspell''''s arrow Weapon Flame of Muspell V2.png Weapon Flame of Muspell V3.png Weapon Flame of Muspell V4.png Weapon Flame of Muspell V5.png Weapon Flame of Muspell V6.png ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=絶炎ムスペル |german=Múspell-Flamme |spanishEU=Fuego de Múspell |spanishLA=Fuego de Múspell |french=Múspell enflammé |italian=Fiamma Múspell |chineseTW=絕炎穆斯貝爾 |portuguese=Fogo de Múspell }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%grants%bonus%Atk/Spd%during combat%=%bonus%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%bonus doubler%' and Description NOT LIKE '%current penalty on each of target%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%not active%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%grants allies within 2 spaces%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%total bonuses on ally%' AND Exclusive='1'|columns=3}} {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Florid Cane
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_薔薇のステッキ |intID=3189 |image=wep_sw137 |exclusive=0 |weaponType=Sword |cost=200 |might=10 |range=1 |effect=Enables【Canto (Rem. +1)】.

At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit during combat.

【Canto (Rem. +1)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move again.

The distance of the movement is the remaining movement the unit had before the actions listed above+1 (If unit used a movement skill that warps them, the remainder is 0).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.) |statModifiers=0,10,0,0,0 |required=Steel Sword |next=Florid Cane+ |promotionRarity=5 |promotionTier=1 |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Canto|Rem. +1}} {{Combat boosts}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=薔薇のステッキ |german=Rosendegen |spanishEU=Bastón florido |spanishLA=Bastón florido |french=Canne fleurie |italian=Bastone florido |chineseTW=薔薇之杖 |portuguese=Bastão florido }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%【Canto (Rem. +1)】%' AND Exclusive='1'|columns=3}} * [[Skill families#Trace|Trace Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Fujin-Raijin Yumi
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_風神雷神弓 |intID=3616 |userVersion1=Bow |userVersion2=Bow Glow |userVersion3=Arrow |userVersion4=Gleam |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Bow |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |cooldown=-1 |effectiveness=Armored,Flying |effect=Enables【Canto (１)】.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). Effective against flying and armored foes. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit, deals damage = 20% of unit's Spd (including when dealing damage with a Special triggered before combat), and neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit has weapon-triangle advantage or unit's Spd > foe's Spd, foe cannot counterattack.

【Canto (１)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move １ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.) |required=Silver Bow |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Canto|1}} {{Effective damage bonus|flying,armored}} {{Temporary buffs}} {{DamageBoost}} {{Follow-up effect neutralization|preventOnly=1}} {{WTA}} {{Prevent counterattacks}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== File:Wep bw102.webp|Spritesheet of '''Fujin-Raijin Yumi''' File:Wep bw102.gif|Animated bow File:Wep ar102.webp|Spritesheet of '''Fujin-Raijin Yumi''''s arrow File:Wep ar102.gif|Animated arrow ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=風神雷神弓 |german=Fujin-Raijin Yumi |spanishEU=Yumi Fujin-Raijin |spanishLA=Yumi Fujin-Raijin |french=Yumi Fujin-Raijin |italian=Fujin-Raijin Yumi |chineseTW=風神雷神弓 |portuguese=Yumi Fujin-Raijin }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=WikiNAME LIKE '%fujin yumi%' OR WikiNAME LIKE '%raijinto%' OR (Description LIKE '%unit%has weapon%triangle advantage%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%boosts Atk%' OR Description LIKE '%unit_s Spd%foe_s Spd%foe cannot counterattack%') AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Skill families/B Passives#Sweep|Sweep Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

|effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of combat for allies within 2 spaces of unit, if the ally has Def > unit's Def or if unit has not entered combat during the current phase, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 and "reduces damage from foe's first attack by 20%" to those allies during combat. At start of unit's combat, if unit is not within 2 spaces of any allies with Def > unit's Def or if unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40% during combat, and deals damage = X% of unit's Spd when Special triggers (X = unit's max Special cooldown count value × 10, + 20; excludes area-of-effect Specials).
|statModifiers=0,16,0,0,0
|required=Silver Axe
|properties=random_owner
}}

title: Just Bow
Jötnar Bow
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_巨人姉妹の弓 |intID=2892 |userVersion1=Bow |userVersion2=Arrow |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Bow |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |cooldown=-1 |effectiveness=Flying |effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during combat and inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Spd/Def during combat = current bonus on each of unit's Atk/Spd/Def. Calculates each stat penalty independently.
Effect:【Pathfinder】

【Pathfinder】
When an ally moves through unit's space, that space is counted as 0 spaces moved instead of 1 space. (Unit's space can be freely added to ally's normal movement. Applies only to allies with movement types that allow movement through unit's space.) |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,0 |required=Silver Bow |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Effective damage bonus|flying}} {{IfUnitInitiates}} {{CombatReductionfromBonus}} {{Pathfinder}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=巨人姉妹の弓 |german=Jötnarbogen |spanishEU=Arco de gigante |spanishLA=Arco de gigante |french=Arc de géantes |italian=Arco gigantesse |chineseTW=巨人姊妹之弓 |portuguese=Arco dos jötnar }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%Atk/Spd/Def-%during combat%' OR Description LIKE '%【Pathfinder】%' OR Description LIKE '%inflicts Atk/Spd/Def% during combat = current bonus on unit\'s Atk/Spd/Def%'|columns=3}} {{Weapons Navbox}}

Körmt
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_ケルムト |intID=2968 |image=wep_mg264 |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Green Tome |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |effect=Grants Atk+3. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk+6 to unit during combat, inflicts Atk-6 on foe during combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, and inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat based on the number of the following conditions that apply × 3 (max: 9):
  - An ally is within 3 spaces of unit.
  - Another foe is within 2 spaces of target.
  - A【Bonus】is active on unit.
  - A【Penalty】is active on foe.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard). |statModifiers=0,17,0,0,0 |required=Rexcalibur |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Combat boosts}} {{Combat reductions}} {{Guaranteed follow-up interaction}} {{EffectfromBonusKeyword}} {{EffectfromPenalty}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== V6.2_v0602b_fuin_Mag_2.webp|Sprite sheet for {{St|Sell-Spell Tome}}, {{St|Dew Dragonstone}} and {{PAGENAME}}'s animation. ==Trivia== {{NorseMyth|name=Körmt and Örmt}} are two rivers which [[Thórr]] must wade through every day whenever he goes for judgement by Yggdrasill. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=ケルムト |german=Körmt |spanishEU=Körmt |spanishLA=Körmt |french=Körmt |italian=Körmt |chineseTW=科爾姆特 |portuguese=Körmt }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%grants Atk+_ to unit%inflicts Atk-_ on foe%unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack%'|columns=3}} {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Lofty Leaflet
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_気高き怪盗の予告状 |intID=3195 |image=wep_mg174 |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Blue Tome |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |effect=Enables【Canto (Unit 3×3)】.

Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat, deals damage = 15% of unit's Spd, and also, if foe has bonuses, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res and inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current bonus on each of foe's stats. Calculates each stat bonus and penalty independently.

【Canto (Unit 3×3)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move to a space within 3 rows and 3 columns centered on unit.

(Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Granted movement treated as Warp movement.) |statModifiers=0,14,3,0,0 |required=Thoron;Shine |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Canto|Unit 3x3}} {{DamageBoost}} {{TemporaryBufffromBonus|source=the foe}} {{TemporaryDebufffromBonus|source=the foe}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== V6.8_v0608a_thief_Mag.webp|Sprite sheet for {{St|Soothing Scent}} and {{PAGENAME}}'s animation. V6.8_v0608a_thief_Mag_2.webp|Sprite sheet for {{PAGENAME}}'s animation. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=気高き怪盗の予告状 |german=Edles Manifest |spanishEU=Manifiesto noble |spanishLA=Manifiesto noble |french=Noble manifeste |italian=Nobile intento |chineseTW=高雅怪盜的預告信 |portuguese=Panfleto solene }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%【Canto (Unit 3×3)】%' OR Description LIKE '%if foe has%bonus%grants%inflicts%' AND Exclusive='1' AND WikiName NOT LIKE '%defier%'}} * [[Skill families/Weapons#Defier's|Defier's Weapons]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Lone-Wolf Blade
content: {{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_一匹狼の鋭剣 |intID=3560 |weaponNa |image=wep_sw150 |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Sword |cost=400 |might=16 |range=1 |cooldown=-1 |effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of turn, grants the following effect to unit at start of turn, or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, grants the following effect to unit after combat: if unit's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-2 to unit; if unit's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value - 1, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit during combat and reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by 30%, and also, if unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during combat. |statModifiers=0,16,0,0,0 |required=Silver Sword |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Start of turn Special modification}} {{After combat Special modification}} {{Temporary buffs}} {{DamagePercentageReduction}} {{AoEDamageReduction}} {{Temporary debuffs}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Trivia== * Prior to {{Version|8.8}}, this weapon was called Lone Wolf in English. It was renamed because of the skill introduced in said update, {{St|Lone Wolf}}. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=一匹狼の鋭剣 |german=Einsamer Wolf |spanishEU=Lobo solitario |spanishLA=Lobo solitario |french=Loup solitaire |italian=Lupo solitario |chineseTW=獨行俠的銳劍 |portuguese=Lobo solitário }} ==References== ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%maximum value%Special cooldown count-1%' OR Description LIKE '%start of turn%Special cooldown count-1%maximum value%'}} * [[Pulse skills]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

(Even if foe initiates combat, unit attacks twice.) |cost=400 |exclusive=true |statModifiers=0,11,-5,0,0 |required=Silver Sword |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |effectSkill1=At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk+5 to unit and inflicts Atk-5 on foe during combat, and also, if unit initiates combat, foe cannot make a follow-up attack. |iconSkill1=Meisterschwert W.png |tagidExtraSkill1=強 |refineStatsAtk=5,1,0,0,0 |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Brave weapon interaction}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{Combat boosts}} {{Combat reductions}} {{IfUnitInitiates}} {{Prevent follow-up}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Trivia== *Meisterschwert's effect working regardless of who initiates combat is accurate to [[Brave Weapons]] in general in all [[Games|''Fire Emblem'' games]] released between {{FE|4}} and {{FE|13}}, inclusive. **The restriction on other Brave Weapons in {{FE|H}} to only works when the user initiates combat was introduced in {{FE|14}}. *Unlike its iteration in {{FE|5}}, Meisterschwert has more might than and harder attainability than a {{St|Brave Sword}} in {{FE|H}}. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=マスターソード |japaneseNotes=''Master Sword'' |german=Meisterschwert |germanNotes=''Master Sword'' |spanishEU=Meisterschwert |spanishLA=Meisterschwert |french=Meisterschwert |italian=Meisterschwert |chineseTW=大師之劍 |portuguese=Meisterschwert }} ==See also== *[[Brave Weapons]] {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%grants Atk+%to unit%inflicts Atk-%on foe%foe cannot make a follow-up%' OR Description LIKE '%inflicts Spd-_%attacks twice%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%inflicts Spd-_%if unit initiates combat,% attacks twice%'|columns=3}} {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Melon Crusher
content:
{{Weapon Infobox
|tagid=SID_スイカ割りの棍棒
|weaponType=Axe
|weaponName={{PAGENAME}}
|might=10
|range=1
|effect=At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 2 damage to unit.
|cost=200
|exclusive=0
|statModifiers=0,10,0,0,0
|next=Melon Crusher+
|promotionRarity=5
|promotionTier=1
|required=Steel Axe
|properties=
}}
==Notes==
* The 100% HP requirement applies to the Atk/Spd/Def/Res +2 as well as the 2 damage after combat.
{{IfUnitAttacked}}
** It drains 2 HP from its wielder when they counterattack, so long as they were at full health at the start of combat. It will NOT drain 2 HP if they don't counterattack and just take the hit however.

title: Nightmare Horn
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_悪夢の女王の角 |weaponType=Beast |might=14 |range=1 |effect=Grants Spd+3. Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack. |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |canUseMove=Cavalry |statModifiers=0,14,3,0,0 |required=Adult (Cavalry) |intID=2157 |sort=429 |value=20 |timingID=1 |abilityID=182 |randomTimestamp=2020-08-20T07:00:00Z |randomMinLv=31 |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |cooldownSkill1=-1 |upgradedEffect=Grants Spd+3. Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%). At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 to unit, inflicts Atk/Def-X on foe during combat (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat + 3; max 6), and also, if X ≥ 5, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30% during combat. |effectSkill1=Enables【Canto (Rem. +1)】.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

【Canto (Rem. +1)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move again.

The distance of the movement is the remaining movement the unit had before the actions listed above+1 (If unit used a movement skill that warps them, the remainder is 0).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.) |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== * Nightmare Horn as the same effect as {{St|Distant Counter}}. {{DamagePercentageReduction}} {{AoEDamageReduction}} {{Beast (Cavalry)}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{Temporary buffs|name=refined Nightmare Horn}} {{Beast (Cavalry) Upgrade}} {{Canto|Rem. +1}} {{Follow-up effect neutralization|name={{St|Nightmare Horn|refine=Skill1}}}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |english=Nightmare Horn |japanese=悪夢の女王の角 |german=Albtraumhorn |spanishEU=Cuerno pesadilla |spanishLA=Cuerno pesadilla |french=Cor cauchemar |italian=Corno da incubo |chineseTW=惡夢女王之角 |portuguese=Berrante pesadelo }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%unit_s Spd > foe_s Spd%educes damage from%area-of-effect Specials%' OR Description LIKE '%【Canto (Rem. +1)】%') AND (Exclusive=1 AND Name NOT LIKE '%+')}} * [[Weapons with Distant Counter]] * [[Weapons with Close Counter]] * [[Trace Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Nightmare's Egg
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_春に微睡む悪夢の卵 |intID=3515 |image=wep_mg322 |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Colorless Tome |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |effect=Grants Spd+3. If a skill like Sing or Dance is used, grants【Foe Penalty Doubler】to target and allies within 2 spaces of target (excluding unit) and inflicts【Panic】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat.

【Foe Penalty Doubler】
Inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = any current penalty on each of those stats for 1 turn. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action. |statModifiers=0,14,3,0,0 |required=Atlas (weapon) |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Foe Penalty Doubler}} {{Panic}} {{CardinalDirections}} {{Temporary buffs}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== V7.3_v0703a_spring_Mag.webp|Sprite sheet for {{PAGENAME}}'s animation. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=春に微睡む悪夢の卵 |german=Albtraumei |spanishEU=Huevo pesadilla |spanishLA=Huevo pesadilla |french=Œuf cauchemar |italian=Uovo da incubo |chineseTW=春天淺眠惡夢之卵 |portuguese=Ovo pesadelo }} ==References== ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%【Foe Penalty Doubler】%' OR Description LIKE '%Sing or Dance is used%' AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Skill families/B Passives#Dance|Dance Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Packleader Tome
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_四狗頭領の魔書 |intID=3689 |userVersion1=Closed |userVersion2=Open |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Red Tome |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |effect=Grants Spd+3. At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Spd/Res-6 and【Panic】on nearest foes within 5 spaces of unit and foes within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Spd/Res-X on foe during combat (X = any current penalty on each of those stats + 5; example: if foe has -7 penalty to Atk, inflicts Atk-12, for a net penalty of Atk-19; calculates each stat penalty independently), and also, if unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action. |statModifiers=0,14,3,0,0 |required=Bolganone;Fenrir |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Penalties}} {{Panic}} {{TemporaryDebufffromPenalty}} {{IfUnitInitiates}} {{Follow-up effect neutralization|preventOnly=1}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== V7.7_v0707b_engage_Mag.webp|Sprite sheet for {{St|Tome of Luxuries}} and {{PAGENAME}}'s animation. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=四狗頭領の魔書 |german=Buch des Rudels |spanishEU=Grimorio de líder |spanishLA=Grimorio de líder |french=Tome de meute |italian=Tomo capobranco |chineseTW=四狗首領的魔書 |portuguese=Tomo da líder }} ==References== ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%at start of turn%, inflicts%est foes%and foes within _ spaces of those foes%' OR Description LIKE '%inflicts penalty on foe_s%/%any current penalty on each of those stats%') AND Exclusive='1' AND WikiName NOT LIKE '%vulture%'}} * [[Skill families/Weapons#Vulture|Vulture Weapons]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+5 and the following status to unit during combat: "If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%." |iconSkill1=Prayer Wheel W.png |properties=random_owner }} ==Effects== {{#invoke:SkillEffectsTable|main |skill1={{SCi|weapon}} Base weapon |s1 Pe={{Eft|Stat Boosts|Spd|3}} |s1 Se={{Eft|Bonuses|Atk/Spd/Def/Res|highest {{SEt|Bonus}}

[[within 2 spaces]] |s2 SeC=At start of turn |s2 Ce1={{Eft|Temporary buffs|Atk/Spd|5}} |s2 Ce1C={{Tgt|Unit}}'s HP ≥ 25%

at start of combat
'''&''' {{Tgt|Unit}} has
[[Weapon-triangle]]
disadvantage }} ==Notes== {{Bonuses}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{Temporary buffs||name={{St|Prayer Wheel|refine=skill1}}}} {{WTA boost|name={{St|Prayer Wheel|refine=skill1}}}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== V3.0 742 legend12 Mag.png|Sprite sheet for Prayer Wheel's animation. ==Trivia== *The effect of this skill was previously bugged. The bug was that if used with a skill that boosts stats when {{St|Sing}}, {{St|Dance}}, or {{St|Gray Waves}} are used, like with {{St|Firestorm Dance}}, when Support Animations are set to Off, bonuses from skills like Firestorm Dance are considered. The correct behavior, not counting {{SEt|bonuses}} from those skills, only worked while Support Animations was set to On. **Since players were using the bugged behavior of Prayer Wheel, [[Intelligent Systems]] decided to make that the intended behavior, and buffed the skill in {{Version|3.2}} so that Prayer Wheel considers bonuses from skills such as {{St|Earth Dance}} regardless of the setting of Support Animations. The skill's description was updated to reflect this. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=清冷の法具 |german=Gebetsmühle |spanishEU=Utensilio ritual |spanishLA=Utensilio ritual |french=Moulin à prières |italian=Ruota rituale |chineseTW=清冷的法具 |portuguese=Roda de oração }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%if%Sing or Dance is used, grants%' and SCategory NOT LIKE 'passive_' OR Description LIKE '%If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%') AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Dance Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}} [[Category:Gem weapons]]

If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk+6 to unit, inflicts Atk-6 on foe during combat, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack. |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |statModifiers=0,17,0,0,0 |required=Adult (Cavalry) |intID=2644 |sort=560 |value=20 |timingID=1 |abilityID=48 |limit1ID=58 |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Combat boosts}} {{Combat reductions}} {{Guaranteed follow-up interaction}} {{Beast (Cavalry)}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=夏夜の夢の角 |german=Sommerhorn |spanishEU=Cuerno veranírico |spanishLA=Cuerno veranírico |french=Corne rêvété |italian=Sognicorno |chineseTW=夏夜夢之角 |portuguese=Chifre utópico }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%grants Atk+%to unit%inflicts Atk-%on foe%' OR Description LIKE '%If unit initiates combat or%makes a guaranteed follow-up attack%'|columns=3}} {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Razing Breath
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_断絶のブレス |weaponType=Dragonstone |might=16 |range=1 |effectiveness=dragon |effect=Effective against dragon foes. Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res. |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |statModifiers=0,16,0,0,0 |required=Flametongue |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |tagidExtraSkill1=一 |effectSkill1=At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = 4 + current bonus on each of unit's stats (calculates each stat bonus independently), and also, if【Bonus】is active on unit, the following will occur based on who initiated combat: if unit initiated, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack; if foe initiated, foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance). |iconSkill1=Razing Breath W.png |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== * Has the same effect as {{St|Distant Counter}}. {{Effective damage bonus|dragon}} {{LowerDefRes}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{TemporaryBufffromBonus|name={{St|Razing Breath|refine=skill1}}}} {{EffectfromBonusKeyword|name={{St|Razing Breath|refine=skill1}}}} {{IfUnitInitiates}} {{Guaranteed follow-up interaction|name={{St|Razing Breath|refine=skill1}}}} {{IfFoeInitiates}} {{Prevent follow-up|name={{St|Razing Breath|refine=skill1}}}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== v3.5_83_dark02_Mag.png|Sprite sheet for {{St|Death}}, {{St|Savage Breath}} and Razing Breath's animation. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=断絶のブレス |german=Unheilvoller Atem |spanishEU=Aliento asolador |spanishLA=Soplo asolador |french=Souffle meurtrier |italian=Soffio devastante |chineseTW=斷絕吐息 |portuguese=Sopro assolador }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%unit can counterattack%if foe_s range = 2%calculates damage%' AND WikiName NOT LIKE '%umbra%' OR Description LIKE '%bonus%current bonus on each of unit_s stats%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%bonus doubler%' OR Description LIKE '%if unit initiate%makes a guaranteed follow-up%if foe initiate%cannot make a follow-up%' OR Description LIKE '%if foe initiate%cannot make a follow-up%if unit initiate%makes a guaranteed follow-up%'}} * [[Countering skills]] * [[Sources of effective against dragon foes]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Retainer's Report
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_参謀役の書 |intID=3367 |userVersion1=Closed |userVersion2=Open |userVersion3=Gleam Closed |userVersion4=Gleam Open |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Red Tome |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |effect=At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard). |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,0 |required=- |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |tagidExtraSkill1=一 |effectSkill1=If a Rally or movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def/Res-7, 【Guard】, and【Exposure】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target after movement through their next actions. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

【Exposure】
Foe's attacks deal +10 damage. |iconSkill1=Retainers Report W.png |properties= }} ==Notes== {{EffectfromPenalty}} {{Temporary buffs}} {{Guaranteed follow-up interaction}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{Penalties|name={{St|Retainer's Report|refine=Skill1}}}} {{Guard|name={{St|Retainer's Report|refine=Skill1}}}} {{Exposure|name={{St|Retainer's Report|refine=Skill1}}}} {{CardinalDirections}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=参謀役の書 |german=Getreuen-Bericht |spanishEU=Informe auxiliar |spanishLA=Informe auxiliar |french=Rapport tactique |italian=Libro consigliere |chineseTW=參謀之書 |portuguese=Relatório auxiliar }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%movement assist%inflicts%/%-%through%' OR Description LIKE '%【Guard】%cardinal directions%') AND Exclusive='1' OR Description LIKE '%【Exposure】%'}} * [[Skill families/B Passives#Ruse|Ruse Passives]] * [[Skill families/B Passives#Snag|Snag Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Sabertooth Fang
content:
{{Weapon Infobox
|tagid=SID_虎戦士の爪牙
|canUseMove=Infantry
|weaponType=Beast
|might=14
|range=1
|effect=Grants Def+3. If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces of unit and target through their next actions after movement. At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.
|cost=400
|exclusive=1
|statModifiers=0,14,0,3,0
|required=Adult (Infantry)
|refinePaths=default
|refineSP=400
|refineMedals=500
|refineDews=200
|upgradedEffect=Grants Def+3. If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces of unit and target through their next actions after movement. At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat. At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, deals +7 damage when Special triggers, and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.
|tagidExtraSkill1=一
|effectSkill1=If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foes within 2 spaces of unit and target. (Does not stack even if effect ranges of unit and target overlap.) If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat.
|iconSkill1=Sabertooth Fang W.png
|properties=random_owner
}}

title: Soothing Scent
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_影潜む密偵の香水瓶 |intID=3194 |image=wep_mg069 |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Red Tome |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |cooldown=-1 |effect=Enables【Canto (Ally 2)】.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd, foe cannot counterattack. If unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat and unit attacks, after combat, deals 10 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target.

【Canto (Ally 2)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces.

(Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Granted movement treated as Warp movement.) |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,0 |required=Bolganone;Fenrir |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Canto|Ally 2}} {{Combat boosts}} {{Prevent counterattacks}} {{IfUnitAttacked}} {{Out of combat damage}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== V6.8_v0608a_thief_Mag.webp|Sprite sheet for {{St|Lofty Leaflet}} and {{PAGENAME}}'s animation. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=影潜む密偵の香水瓶 |german=Betörender Duft |spanishEU=Aroma relajante |spanishLA=Aroma relajante |french=Parfum apaisant |italian=Profumo soave |chineseTW=暗影密探的香水瓶 |portuguese=Aroma calmante }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%【Canto (Ally 2)】%' OR Description LIKE '%unit_s Spd%foe cannot counterattack%'|columns=3}} {{Weapons Navbox}}

content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_深き海の底の双槍 |intID=3642 |image=wep_lc150 |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Lance |cost=400 |might=11 |range=1 |effect=Enables【Canto (Rem. +1)】.

Grants Spd+5. Unit attacks twice (even if foe initiates combat, unit attacks twice). Deals damage = 20% of unit's Spd during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Canto (Rem. +1)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move again.

The distance of the movement is the remaining movement the unit had before the actions listed above+1 (If unit used a movement skill that warps them, the remainder is 0).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.) |statModifiers=0,11,5,0,0 |required=Silver Lance |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Canto|Rem. +1}} {{Brave weapon interaction}} {{DamageBoost}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=深き海の底の双槍 |german=Paddellanze |spanishEU=Pala surfista |spanishLA=Pala surfista |french=Pelle océan |italian=Spada oceanica |chineseTW=深邃海底的雙槍 |portuguese=Lança surfista }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=Description LIKE '%Grants Spd+%unit attacks twice%' AND (SP=300 OR Exclusive='1') OR Description LIKE '%deals damage = 20%of unit_s Spd%' AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Brave weapons]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

{{Tgt|Ally}}'s [[move type]]
on current team ≤ 2 }} ==Notes== {{New WTA|colorless}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{Tactic Passive notes|name={{St|Tactical Gale|refine=Skill1}}}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Trivia== {{Rsn|指揮R全4|Tactic R All 4}} * The refined effect may be a reference to the skill [[fireemblemwiki:Rally Spectrum|Rally Spectrum]], which is exclusive to the Grandmaster class (the promoted version of the Tactician class) in {{FE|13}}. Both skills grant allies a boost to all stats (except HP) if they are within a few spaces of the user. ** However, Rally Spectrum acts much like other Rally skills in that the user must spend their turn in order to use the skill. The refined effect of Tactical Gale instead acts as a passive skill. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=軍師の風書 |german=Taktischer Sturm |spanishEU=Tifón estratégico |spanishLA=Tifón estratégico |french=Rafale tactique |italian=Burrasca tattica |chineseTW=軍師的風書 |portuguese=Ventania tática }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%grants weapon-triangle advantage%' AND Description LIKE '%colorless%weapon-triangle%' OR Description LIKE '%ally_s movement type on current team ≤%') AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Raven Tomes]] * [[Tactic Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and/or 1 extra space of movement granted by a skill like Armor March or Armored Boots is active, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 and Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack during combat. Does not stack.) |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |userVersion1=Bow |userVersion2=Arrow |statModifiers=0,14,3,0,0 |required=Silver Bow |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |upgradedEffect=Effective against flying foes. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance). |tagidExtraSkill1=一 |effectSkill1=If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat, and if foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and unit's Spd > foe's Spd, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack, and unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack. |iconSkill1=Tanngrisnir W.png |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Effective damage bonus|Flying}} {{EffectfromBonusesMobility|temporary buffs and Special cooldown charge +1}} {{Temporary buffs}} {{CooldownChargePlus|perAttack=user}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{EffectfromBonus}} {{CooldownChargePlus}} {{Follow-up before counterattack|phase=enemy|preempt=1|name={{St|Tanngrisnir|refine=Skill1}}}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Trivia== {{NorseMyth|is one of two goats that pull [[Wikipedia:Thor|Thor]]'s chariot.}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |english=Tanngrisnir |japanese=タングリスニ |german=Tanngrisnir |spanishEU=Tanngrisnir |spanishLA=Tanngrisnir |french=Tanngrisnir |italian=Tanngrisnir |chineseTW=坦格里斯尼爾 |portuguese=Tanngrisnir }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%if%bonus%is active%grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+%during combat%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%active on foe%' OR Description LIKE '%if%movement%is active%grants%during combat%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%active on foe%' OR Description LIKE '%if%bonus%is active%special cooldown charge +1%' OR Description LIKE '%unit_s%foe_s%unit can counterattack before foe_s first attack%') AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Skill families/B Passives#Preempt|Preempt Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Total War Tome
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_戦神の破界の戦記 |intID=3549 |userVersion1=Closed |userVersion2=Open |exclusive=1 |weaponType=Blue Tome |cost=400 |might=14 |range=2 |cooldown=-1 |effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5, 【Sabotage】, and【Stall】on closest foes within 5 spaces of unit and foes within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, and also, if a stat penalty is active on any foe within 2 spaces of target, neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

【Sabotage】
Inflicts penalty on unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest penalty on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit through its next action. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

【Stall】
If unit has "unit can move 1 extra space," converts that effect into "restricts movement to 1 space" through its next action. |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,0 |required=Thoron;Shine |properties= }} ==Notes== {{Penalties}} {{Sabotage}} {{Stall}} {{Temporary debuffs}} {{Guaranteed follow-up interaction}} {{CooldownChargeMinusNeutralization}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== V7.4_v0704a_child_Mag.webp|Sprite sheet for {{PAGENAME}}'s animation. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=戦神の破界の戦記 |german=Kriegsbuch |spanishEU=Gr. bélico ruina |spanishLA=Gr. bélico ruina |french=Ruine belliqueuse |italian=Guerra totale |chineseTW=戰神的破界戰記 |portuguese=Tomo ruinoso }} ==References== ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%【Sabotage】%' OR Description LIKE '%【Stall】%' AND Description NOT LIKE '%【Stall】is active%' OR Description LIKE '%at start of turn%inflicts%/%-%est foe%' OR Description LIKE '%at start of turn%, inflicts%est foes%and foes within _ spaces of those foes%') AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Menace Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}

| |} ==Audio== bgm_tb_kari.ogg|An unused file that sounds very similar (but not identical) to {{BGMPage|bgm_battle_FE03_01.ogg}}. Likely a temporary file for testing that was never removed, as kari translates to temporary. ===Unit voice lines=== All of following Units have unused voice lines: {{#cargo_query:table=Units|fields=CONCAT('{{(}}Ut{{!}}',_pageName,'{{)}} ([[',_pageName,'/Quotes|quote page]])')|where=Origin='Fire Emblem Heroes' AND (Person IN ('Anna','Alfonse','Bruno','Sharena','Veronica','Fáfnir')) AND (TagID!='EID_フード' AND TagID NOT LIKE 'EID_ブルーノ_%' AND TagID NOT LIKE '_ID_ヴェロニカ_%' AND TagID NOT LIKE 'PID_%味方' AND TagID NOT LIKE 'EID_ファフニール') AND Properties__full NOT RLIKE 'spec' AND Properties__full NOT RLIKE 'brave'|order by=IFNULL(IntID,9999)|default=|format=ul}} ==Skills== These skills are skills that are present in the game files, but are not used or have properties that are never used (e.g. the skill in the special skill refine of {{Wt|Camilla's Axe|refine=Skill1}} has usage restrictions so that only {{Mt|cavalry}} and {{Mt|flying}} units can use it, but this is never seen since no other unit can use Camilla's Axe). ===SID_無し=== Skill with no name or any properties. It cannot be forged, and does nothing when used. {{Weapon Infobox |no cargo=true |noImg=1 |weaponName=— |might=0 |range=0 |cost=0 |exclusive=0 |statModifiers=0,0,0,0,0 |required=- |properties= }}{{clear}} ===Exclusive skills=== {{See Also|:Category:Skills with unused restrictions}} For most [[exclusive skills]] such as {{St|Sacae's Blessing}}, the list of allowed movement or weapon types usually contains every single type instead of just being empty (as SID_無し is) or minimally having only the Hero's weapon type and movement type. However, some do not have a full list and exclude certain types of units despite never being inheritable. These are also likely an indication that these skills will only ever be released on units that match its restrictions. ====Weapons==== Only weapons that do not allow all movement types are listed. {{#cargo_query:table=Skills|fields=CONCAT('
    ',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT '
  • [[',_pageName,'|',Name,']]
    • ' ORDER BY Name SEPARATOR ''),'
')=Skills,CONCAT('{{(}}or{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetCannotUse{{!}}icons{{!}}canUseMove=',CanUseMove__full,'{{!}}canUseWeapon=',CanUseWeapon__full,'{{)}}{{!}}None{{)}}')=Cannot use|where=Scategory='weapon' AND Exclusive=1 AND RefinePath IS NULL AND CanUseMove__full!='{{MoveList|All}}'|group by=CanUseMove__full,CanUseWeapon__full}} ====Assists==== {{#cargo_query:table=Skills|fields=CONCAT('
    ',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT '
  • [[',_pageName,'|',Name,']]
    • ' ORDER BY Name SEPARATOR ''),'
')=Skills,CONCAT('{{(}}or{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetCannotUse{{!}}icons{{!}}canUseMove=',CanUseMove__full,'{{!}}canUseWeapon=',CanUseWeapon__full,'{{)}}{{!}}None{{)}}')=Cannot use|where=Scategory='assist' AND Exclusive=1 AND RefinePath IS NULL AND !(CanUseMove__full='{{MoveList|All}}' AND CanUseWeapon__full='{{WeaponList|All}}')|group by=CanUseMove__full,CanUseWeapon__full}} ====Specials==== {{#cargo_query:table=Skills|fields=CONCAT('
    ',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT '
  • [[',_pageName,'|',Name,']]
    • ' ORDER BY Name SEPARATOR ''),'
')=Skills,CONCAT('{{(}}or{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetCannotUse{{!}}icons{{!}}canUseMove=',CanUseMove__full,'{{!}}canUseWeapon=',CanUseWeapon__full,'{{)}}{{!}}None{{)}}')=Cannot use|where=Scategory='special' AND Exclusive=1 AND RefinePath IS NULL AND !(CanUseMove__full='{{MoveList|All}}' AND CanUseWeapon__full='{{WeaponList|All}}')|group by=CanUseMove__full,CanUseWeapon__full}} ====Passives==== {{#cargo_query:table=Skills|fields=CONCAT('
    ',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT '
  • [[',_pageName,'|',Name,']]
    • ' ORDER BY Name SEPARATOR ''),'
')=Skills,CONCAT('{{(}}or{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetCannotUse{{!}}icons{{!}}canUseMove=',CanUseMove__full,'{{!}}canUseWeapon=',CanUseWeapon__full,'{{)}}{{!}}None{{)}}')=Cannot use|where=Scategory LIKE 'passive%' AND Exclusive=1 AND RefinePath IS NULL AND !(CanUseMove__full='{{MoveList|All}}' AND CanUseWeapon__full='{{WeaponList|All}}')|group by=CanUseMove__full,CanUseWeapon__full}} ===Refined skills=== The following skill passives are found on refined weapons. For convenience, the following list is the list containing only skills that do have restrictions. ====SID_先導R歩行飛行==== {{Passive|no cargo=true |name=— |type=R |exclusive=0 |1name= |alt1name=Hinokas Spear W |1required=- |1effect=Infantry and flying allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit. |1cost=0 |statModifiers1= |canUseMove=Flying |canUseWeapon={{WeaponList|all}} |properties= }} =====SID_トライアングル===== {{Passive|no cargo=true |name=— |type=R |exclusive=0 |1name= |alt1name=Triangle W |1required=- |1effect=If the number of flying allies within 2 spaces ≥ 2, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat, and if unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice. |1cost=0 |canUseMove=Flying |canUseWeapon={{WeaponList|melee}} |properties= }} ====SID_大紋章R騎飛刃3==== {{Passive|no cargo=true |name=— |type=R |exclusive=0 |1name= |1required=- |alt1name=Camillas Axe W |1effect=Grants Atk/Spd+3 to cavalry and flying allies within 2 spaces during combat. |1cost=0 |canUseMove={{MoveList|Cavalry, Flying}} |canUseWeapon={{WeaponList|All}} |properties= }} ==Skill effects== ==Hero skills unlock rarity== Some Heroes have unlock rarities for skills where the unlock rarity is lower than the lowest possible rarity the Hero can be obtained at. These can be viewed on each individual Hero page. These unused unlock rarities appear to be intentional for these reasons: *They are displayed in [[Fire Emblem Heroes: Summoner's Guide]]. *When the summoning rarities of Heroes in a pool are lowered, their unlock rarities are not modified. ==Revision differences== ===Removed/Altered Files=== Tiki Summering Scion BtlFace D Removed.png|Altered artwork of Tiki: Summering Scion Gaius Thief Exposed BtlFace Removed.png|Attack Art where Gaius: Thief Exposed isn't pulling the bowstring. Gaius Thief Exposed BtlFace C Removed.png|Special Art where Gaius: Thief Exposed isn't pulling the bowstring. Empty Passive Icon Glow.png|Found in files/assets/Common/UI/Skill_Passive5.png. It appears to be the [[File:Empty Passive Icon.png|x22px|alt=|link=File:Empty Passive Icon.png]] empty passive icon layered over {{Pt|Steady Stance 4}}. It was later removed when Steady Stance 4 was added to the game.

content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_ヴラスキャルヴ |weaponType=Blue Tome |might=14 |range=2 |effect=If unit's HP ≤ 50% and foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack. |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |userVersion1=Closed |userVersion2=Open |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,0 |required=Thoron |SE=se_effect_ice.flac |properties=enemy_only }} ==Effects== {{#invoke:SkillEffectsTable|main |Ce={{Eft|Vantage}} |CeC=Enemy Phase '''&'''
{{Tgt|Unit}}'s HP ≤ 50% }} ==Notes== * Valaskjálf has the same effect as {{St|Vantage 2}}. {{Preempt}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==Gallery== Valaskjalf_Cover.png Valaskjalf_Inside.png ==Trivia== {{NorseMyth|("the Shelf of the Slain") is one of Odin's Halls, a great dwelling built and roofed with pure silver. In this room is a high seat, [[Wikipedia:Hliðskjálf|Hliðskjálf]], where Odin can watch over the entire universe. To put it simply, it is Odin's throne room.}} ** In the context of {{FE|H}} this corresponds with {{St|Hliðskjálf}}, the staff used by {{Ut|Veronica: Brave Princess}}. ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=ヴラスキャルヴ |german=Valaskjálf |spanishEU=Valaskjálf |spanishLA=Valaskjálf |french=Valaskjálf |italian=Valaskjálf |chineseTW=瓦拉斯卡夫 |portuguese=Valaskjálf }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%unit can counterattack before foe_s first attack%' OR Name LIKE'%Valaskjálf%') AND (Exclusive=1 AND Name NOT LIKE '%+' AND Properties HOLDS NOT 'arcane')}} {{Weapons Navbox}}

title: Wedding-Bell Axe
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_幸せの鐘の斧 |weaponName=Wedding-Bell Axe |image=wep_ax089 |weaponType=Axe |might=16 |range=1 |cooldown=-1 |effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants "unit can move to a space adjacent to an ally within 2 spaces" and【Triangle Attack】to unit and allies within 2 spaces. If unit initiates combat or if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat.

【Triangle Attack】
If unit initiates combat and 2 or more allies (excluding unit) with Triangle Attack are within 2 spaces of unit, unit attacks twice. (That turn only. title: Wolf Queen Fang
content:
{{Weapon Infobox |tagid=SID_狼女王の牙 |weaponType=Beast |might=14 |range=1 |effect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Spd by number of allies within 2 spaces × 2. (Maximum bonus of +6 to each stat.) At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when Special triggers. |cooldown=-1 |cost=400 |exclusive=1 |canUseMove=Infantry |statModifiers=0,14,0,0,0 |required=Adult (Infantry) |refinePaths=default |refineSP=400 |refineMedals=500 |refineDews=200 |upgradedEffect=Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75% or unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit during combat, and also, if both conditions are met, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe during combat. At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, deals +7 damage when Special triggers, and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit. |tagidExtraSkill1=一 |effectSkill1=Enables【Canto (Rem. +1)】while transformed.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat, and also, when unit deals damage (even 0 damage) to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit.

【Canto (Rem. +1)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move again.

The distance of the movement is the remaining movement the unit had before the actions listed above+1 (If unit used a movement skill that warps them, the remainder is 0).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.) |iconSkill1=Wolf Queen Fang W.png |properties=random_owner }} ==Notes== {{Temporary buffs}} {{Beast (Infantry)}} ==Upgrades== {{Weapon Upgrade List}} ===Notes=== {{Temporary debuffs}} {{Beast (Infantry) Upgrade}} {{Canto|Rem. +1}} {{CombatHPRecovery}} {{IfUnitTransforms|+7 Special damage boost, cooldown charge neutralization effects and {{Kp|Canto (Rem. +1)}}}} ==List of owners== {{Skill Hero List}} ==In other languages== {{OtherLanguages |japanese=狼女王の牙 |german=Wolfzahn |spanishEU=Colmillo lupino |spanishLA=Colmillo lupino |french=Croc de reine |italian=Zanna regale |chineseTW=狼女王之牙 |portuguese=Presa lupina }} ==See also== {{See also skills|cond=(Description LIKE '%boosts unit_s%/%by number of allies within 2 spaces%' OR Description LIKE '%【Canto (Rem. +1)】%') AND Exclusive='1'}} * [[Form Passives]] * [[Trace Passives]] {{Weapons Navbox}}
